alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Mountains; Upper Tularosa Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 22 at 11:58AM MST until February 23 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph possible. * WHERE...Lower Rio Grande Valley, San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands, South Central Highlands, South Central Mountains, Upper Tularosa Valley and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Mountains; Upper Tularosa Valley
